bill_title: revise certain fees charged by the Office of Secretary of State.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise certain fees charged by the Office of Secretary of State. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 47-9-9 be amended to read as follows: 47-9-9. The secretary of state shall charge and collect, at the time of any service of process on the secretary of state as resident agent of a corporation, twenty-five ten dollars, which amount may be recovered as taxable costs by the party to the suit or action causing the service to be made if the party prevails in the suit or action. Section 2. That § 47-20-7 be amended to read as follows: 47-20-7. The annual report required by § 47-20-5 shall be delivered to the secretary of state before the first day of the second month following the anniversary month of the corporation, of each year following incorporation. A fee of thirty ten dollars shall be paid to the secretary of state for filing the report. If the report does not conform to requirements, it shall be returned to the cooperative for necessary corrections. The penalties for failure to file the report do not apply if it is corrected and returned within thirty days after receipt thereof. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
